alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:18AM CDT until July 14 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR WESTERN FRONTIER COUNTY... At 1017 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moorefield to Stockville to 13 miles northwest of Indianola, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Curtis, Moorefield, Stockville, Maywood, Quick, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 32 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
